result.html: Ainmfhocal baininscneach é seoThis is a feminine noun.
result.ponchtml: Ainmḟocal baininscneaċ é seoThis is a feminine noun.

result.html: Ainmfhocal firinscneach é seoThis is a masculine noun.
result.ponchtml: Ainmḟocal firinscneaċ é seoThis is a masculine noun.

result.eng: Don't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ga: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.orig: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.html: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ponchtml: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roiṁ an ainmḟocal sa ċás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.

result.eng: The noun and the adjective agree in gender.
result.ga: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne de
result.orig: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne de
result.html: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne deThe noun and the adjective agree in gender.
result.ponchtml: Réitíonn an t-ainmḟocal agus an aidiaċt ó ṫaoḃ inscne deThe noun and the adjective agree in gender.
